item.title: 鲍威尔发出 "2020 年美联储框架语言 "的信号
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，决策者们正在权衡对指导其货币政策决策的框架的关键部分进行修改，包括如何看待美国就业不足问题和如何接近通胀目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said policymakers are weighing changes to key parts of the framework that guides their monetary policy decisions, including how they think about shortfalls in US employment and approach their inflation target.】

item.title: 美国 4 月生产者价格意外下跌，利润率缩水
item.description: 4 月份支付给美国生产商的价格出人意料地出现了五年来最大的降幅，这主要反映了利润率的下滑，表明企业正在吸收更高的关税所带来的部分冲击。【原文：Prices paid to US producers unexpectedly declined in April by the most in five years, largely reflecting a slump in margins, suggesting companies are absorbing some of the hit from higher tariffs.】

item.title: 美国零售销售勉强增长，表明消费有所回落
item.description: 美国 4 月份的零售额增长明显放缓，表明消费者因担心关税导致价格上涨而减少了在汽车、体育用品和其他类别进口商品上的支出。【原文：Growth in US retail sales decelerated notably in April, suggesting consumers pulled back spending on cars, sporting goods and other categories of imported goods amid concerns about rising prices from tariffs.】

item.title: 纽约制造业活动连续第三个月萎缩
item.description: 纽约州 5 月份的工厂活动连续第三个月萎缩，而衡量材料支付价格的指标则跃升至 2022 年 7 月以来的最高水平，凸显了特朗普政府关税的影响。【原文：New York state factory activity contracted in May for a third month while a gauge of prices paid for materials jumped to the highest level since July 2022, highlighting the impact of the Trump administration’s tariffs.】

item.title: 伊朗核协议将小幅刺激全球石油供应
item.description: 伊朗核计划达成协议的前景导致石油价格周四大幅下跌。现实情况是，德黑兰能够运回的额外原油相对较少，但这些原油可能会运到一个正准备过剩的市场。【原文：The prospect of a deal over Iran’s nuclear program saw oil fall sharply on Thursday. The reality is that Tehran has relatively little extra crude that it can bring back — but it could arrive in a market that’s gearing up for surplus.】

item.title: 南非宣布改变通胀目标后，兰特飙升
item.description: 在南非财政部副部长表示即将宣布该国的通胀目标制度后，兰特兑美元汇率飙升至两个月来的最强水平，政府债券收益率也有所下降。【原文：The rand surged to its strongest level against the dollar in two months and government bond yields fell after South Africa’s deputy finance minister said an announcement on the country’s inflation-targeting regime is imminent.】

item.title: 游击队的敲诈勒索限制了哥伦比亚平原的农用工业发展
item.description:
和平协议签署多年后，新的游击队又开始敲诈哥伦比亚的棕榈、大米和石油生产商。"一位商人警告说："没有安全，就没有投资。【原文：

Años después del acuerdo de paz, nuevas guerrillas extorsionan a productores de palma, arroz y petróleo en Colombia. “Sin seguridad, nadie invierte”, advierte un empresario.

】

item.title: 欧盟协议将为里夫斯提供 100 亿英镑并降低增税风险
item.description: 据经济学家称，如果与欧盟的贸易协议得到改善，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在秋季预算中获得 100 亿英镑（约合 133 亿美元），并限制进一步增税的必要性。【原文：An improved trade deal with the European Union would hand UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves £10 billion ($13.3 billion) in the Autumn Budget and limit the need for further tax increases, according to economists.】

item.title: 勒索团伙横行哥伦比亚最大产油区
item.description: 海梅-克鲁兹（Jaime Cruz）已经有十多年没有听到哥伦比亚勒索团伙的消息了，直到 2023 年 9 月的一天，这位棕榈油种植者查看了自己的手机，结果吓了一大跳。【原文：Jaime Cruz hadn’t heard from Colombia’s extortion gangs for more than a decade until the palm-oil farmer checked his phone one day in September 2023 and got a terrible shock.】

item.title: 华尔街的高频交易员正在涌入沙特阿拉伯
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正在加大力度吸引高频交易公司，这一活动已经吸引了从 Citadel Securities 到 Hudson River Trading 等大型公司的参与，沙特阿拉伯希望借此提高中东最大股票市场的活跃度。【原文：Saudi Arabia is ramping up efforts to lure high frequency trading firms — a campaign that’s already brought in major players from Citadel Securities to Hudson River Trading — as it looks to bolster activity on the Middle East’s largest stock market.】

item.title: 科特迪瓦法院推迟至 5 月 22 日裁定蒂亚姆的党内领导地位
item.description: 象牙海岸一家法院推迟了对瑞士信贷集团前首席执行官蒂贾内-蒂亚姆（Tidjane Thiam）在2023年当选时是否有资格领导该国主要反对党的裁决。【原文：An Ivory Coast court delayed a ruling on whether former Credit Suisse AG Chief Executive Officer Tidjane Thiam was eligible to lead the country’s main opposition party when he was elected in 2023.】

item.title: 韩国以小博大，力争核电崛起
item.description:
首尔正试图通过专注于新兴的 SMR 领域，复制其在出口大型原子技术方面的成功经验。【原文：

Seoul is trying to replicate its success exporting large-scale atomic technology by focusing on the nascent SMR space.

】

item.title: 币安称受贿员工向黑客泄露数据 索要 2,000 万美元赎金
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.称，黑客贿赂美国以外的承包商或员工，窃取客户敏感数据，并索要 2000 万美元赎金，这是加密货币交易平台最引人注目的安全漏洞之一。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. said hackers bribed contractors or employees outside the US to steal sensitive customer data and demanded a $20 million ransom, in one of the most high-profile security breaches of a crypto trading platform.】

item.title: 印度中央银行董事会考虑修改资本框架
item.description: 印度储备银行董事会周四召开会议，考虑改变央行的资本结构，此举可能会影响央行每年向政府转移多少现金。【原文：The board of the Reserve Bank of India met Thursday and considered a change to the central bank’s capital structure, a move that could potentially affect how much cash it transfers to the government every year.】

item.title: 战事持续，欧盟考虑恢复乌克兰贸易配额制
item.description: 欧盟正在考虑恢复从乌克兰进口几种农产品的配额，此举可能会终止对这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的贸易救济。【原文：The European Union is considering reinstating quotas on imports of several agriculture goods from Ukraine, a move that could end trade relief for the war-hit nation.】

item.title: 德国商业银行称联合信贷银行未登记参加会议投票
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）称，正在考虑是否提出收购要约的意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）没有登记其股份，以便在这家德国贷款机构的年度股东大会上投票。【原文：Commerzbank AG said UniCredit SpA, the Italian rival that’s considering whether to make a takeover offer, didn’t register its stake to vote at the German lender’s annual general meeting.】

item.title: Meta 预见未来：人工智能将满足您的社交需求
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，莱利-格里芬（Riley Griffin）将从 Meta 反垄断审判中报道该公司对竞争对手的看法以及社交网络的未来。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin reports from the Meta antitrust trial about the company’s views of its rivals and the future of social networks.】

item.title: 关税冲击减弱，停滞不前的首次公开募股（IPO）被吸引离场
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的关税干扰了股市，股市的强劲反弹重新点燃了全球的首次公开募股（IPO）活动，因为没有直接贸易风险的企业希望在夏季来临之前，在地缘政治紧张局势再次爆发之前完成交易。【原文：The stock market’s striking rebound from the tariff disruption imposed by US President Donald Trump has rekindled global IPO activity, as businesses without direct exposure to trade look to get deals done before the summer — and before geopolitical tensions flare up again.】

item.title: 美国贸易部长在韩国会见同行讨论关税问题
item.description: 几个月前，当韩国计划召开亚太经合组织贸易部长会议时，一些高级官员起初并不指望能成行。【原文：When South Korea was planning the APEC Trade Ministerial meeting a few months ago, some top officials initially weren’t expected to make the trip.】

item.title: 中美贸易冲突有可能使欧洲成为倾销地
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，詹姆斯-梅杰（James Mayger）和威廉-霍洛宾（William Horobin）将探讨人们对中国廉价商品将涌入欧洲并刺激该地区保护主义抬头的担忧。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today, James Mayger and William Horobin look at concerns cheap Chinese goods will flood Europe and spur increased protectionism in the region. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 周五变得紧张，交易员为特朗普周末消息做准备
item.description: 对于 Impax 资产管理公司的投资组合经理 Tony Trzcinka 来说，周五曾经是清闲的一天，但现在却是一周中最忙碌的时候。【原文：Fridays used to be a slow day for Tony Trzcinka, a portfolio manager at Impax Asset Management, but now it’s the busiest time of the week.】

item.title: 印度股市创七个月新高，信实银行和 HDFC 银行大涨
item.description: 印度股市周四飙升至 10 月份以来的最高水平，基准 NSE Nifty 50 指数的周度期权到期引发了剧烈的盘中波动。【原文：Indian stocks surged to their highest level since October on Thursday, with the expiry of weekly options on the benchmark NSE Nifty 50 Index triggering sharp intraday movements.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯警告金融体系仍面临贸易风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）告诫说，近期的贸易动荡仍有可能危及该地区的金融体系，迄今为止，该体系已经经受住了美国政策突然转变所带来的影响。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos cautioned that the recent trade turmoil could still upend the region’s financial system, which has so far weathered the fallout from the abrupt shifts in US policy.】

item.title: 波兰引领东欧第一季度经济增长
item.description: 在私人消费的推动下，波兰经济在今年前三个月的增长速度是东欧最快的。【原文：Poland’s economy expanded the fastest in Eastern Europe in the first three months of the year, driven by private consumption.】

item.title: 马拉维力争在大选后第三次获得国际货币基金组织（IMF）协议的眷顾
item.description: 马拉维一直在努力跟踪国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的项目，这些项目带来了急需的资金，在过去五年中，马拉维曾两次未能完成这些项目。马拉维政府计划在 9 月大选后重新努力。【原文：Malawi has had a tough time keeping track of its International Monetary Fund programs that bring in much-needed financing, failing twice in the last five years to conclude them. The government plans a fresh effort after the September elections.】

item.title: 受关税威胁影响，爱尔兰三月份对美出口飙升 395
item.description: 统计局称，3月份爱尔兰对美国的出口额同比增长了394.9%，其中医疗和医药产品的出口额增长了394.9%。【原文：The value of exports from Ireland to the US rose 394.9% in March from a year earlier, on medical and pharmaceutical goods, the statistics office said.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服利润因人工智能和新业务成本下降 31
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团公司（Ant Group Co.【原文：Ant Group Co.’s quarterly profit fell 31% as the firm invested in artificial intelligence and other initiatives to bolster revenue growth.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空正与马斯克的 SpaceX 公司洽谈在航班上使用星际链路的事宜
item.description: 阿联酋航空正在与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司商讨，以全面改造该航空公司的互联网服务，这家全球最大的国际航空公司正寻求加强其机上 Wi-Fi 服务。【原文：Emirates is in discussions with Elon Musk’s SpaceX to overhaul the carrier’s internet service as the world’s largest international airline looks to enhance its in-flight Wi-Fi.】

item.title: 摩根大通全球市场主管称美国可能躲过经济衰退
item.description: 摩根大通银行全球市场战略主管表示，美国可能会躲过经济衰退，因为随着全球贸易局势的进一步明朗，出现这种情况的可能性已经降低。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s chief of global markets strategy said the US could dodge a recession as the probability of that scenario has decreased following better clarity over global trade.】

item.title: 梅洛尼希望在下一次预算中再次削减意大利的工资税
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）所在政党的经济部长表示，意大利政府希望在来年再发放一次福利，以减轻中产阶级的收入负担。【原文：Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni’s government wants to ease the burden on middle-class earnings with another giveaway in the coming year, according to the economics chief of her political party.】
